name: be-wasm
description: Express + SQLite (WASM) API and frontend demo for WebContainer

scripts.dev:container: concurrently -k -n api,notes "npm run dev:container:api" "npm run dev:container:notes"
scripts.pretest: npm run build:notes && npm run build:runner-ui
scripts.build:runner: npm run build:notes && npm run build:snapshot && npm run build:runner-ui
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:runner && npm run typecheck:notes
